message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a limited time at the special price of $150. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Thanks for your interest, Bob! I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle at $135? It's a small adjustment, but it would really help me out.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $125? I'm really interested in the product and I think it's worth it to me at that price.
